author: Axios
title: New York's race against the clock on coronavirus
description: With much of America ground to a halt, the state of New York is trying to nearly triple its hospital capacity in less than a month. Why it matters: The state is bracing for a peak in coronavirus hospitalizations in mid-April, Gov. Andrew Cuomo said on Friday.…
content:
With much of America ground to a halt, the state of New York is trying to nearly triple its hospital capacity in less than a month.
Why it matters: The state is bracing for a peak in coronavirus hospitalizations in mid-April, Gov. Andrew Cuomo said on Friday… [+1466 chars]
